text: "Baby I'm Yours" is a 1965 song originally recorded by Barbara Lewis. It was the title track to her studio album of the same name. The song was covered by numerous artists including Cher for the 1990 movie Mermaids. title: Baby I'm Yours (Barbara Lewis song)
